# Task

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.



# Data

pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"])

```julia
function pig_latinify(words)
    Threads.@threads for word in words
        output = convert_to_pig_latin(word)
        println(output)
    end
end

# Convert a single word to pig latin
function convert_to_pig_latin(word)
    first_letter, remaining_letters = first_letter_and_remaining(word)
    return first_letter * "ay" * remaining_letters * (length(remaining_letters) == 0 ? "" : "way")
end

# Helper function to split the word into its first letter and the rest of the letters
function first_letter_and_remaining(word)
    first_letter = first_letter_of(word)
    return first_letter, remaining_letters(word)
end

# Get the first letter of a word
function first_letter_of(word)
    return word[1]
end

# Get the rest of the letters in a word
function remaining_letters(word)
    return word[2:end]
end

pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"]) # Output to console
```
